programme.desc: Walt and his employee Greg catch big hand-painted bluegill and largemouth bass.

programme.title: Guide's Tails

programme.desc: Mark just can't get over last year's hunt with his Dad. He wanted nothing more than to pay his old man back for introducing him to whitetail hunting, but they didn't even get eyes on a decent buck. This season it's all about redemption.

programme.desc: New York Mets superstar Pete Alonso joins Steve in Colorado to hunt for mule deer bucks. Pete shares insights from the major leagues, while Steve dispenses hunting tips.
